description: Non-profit organisation that works to promote digital rights for Palestinians.
Offers a Master’s in Data Science and Business Analytics.
Offers a Computer Science apprenticeship with a specialisation in Artificial Intelligence.
Hosted the first Palestine Creative AI Week which culminated in a hackathon.
A technology fund of seed capital, with the goal of supporting technology and ICT-related start-ups, fostering growth and expansion through direct investment.
A dedicated Palestinian private equity fund manager, that invests in Tech company among other sectors.
Ibtikar invests in good ideas of Palestinian entrepreneurs as seed investments.
Largest telecommunications company in Palestine building the state’s first and second data centers.
Technology company offers big data solutions.
Signals intelligence company that provides a security and threat alert system via a mobile application and Web dashboard.
Provides chatbots specialised for e-commerce which can be integrated with Facebook Messenger and online shops.
A digital health application that collects data from smartphones and wearables to generate recommendations for health and lifestyle changes in order to prevent chronic diseases.
